author: Whitney Jefferson
title: Judith Light Is An Inspiration On The SAG Awards Red Carpet
text:
View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10421018 2. She gave us this power pose. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10421019 3. This thoughtful pose. View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10421015 4. Hand-in-your-hair pose. View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10421026 5. She gave us arm-over-the-head realness. View this image ›
Alberto E. Rodriguez / Getty Images ID: 10421005 6. The casual lean. View this image ›
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images ID: 10421041 7. The “go ahead, see if I care!” pose. View this image ›
Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images ID: 10421029 8. The multi-tasking pose (posing while waving to your adoring fans). View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10421081 9. Get down with your bad self, Judith!! View this image ›
Robyn Beck / AFP / Getty Images ID: 10421116 10. Looking forward to you slaying throughout the rest of awards season. View this image ›
